function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate housing design and planning contributing to poor living conditions and increased disease susceptibility.","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient adequacy, equipment, flexibility, and adaptability of existing housing in the context of pandemic challenges","category":"Inadequate hospital design ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey revealing inadequate conditions in multi-family housing in podgorica","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate presence of outdoor and safe indoor spaces for socialization","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on health and safety in architectural space design","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accessibility of public spaces within 5 min walking distance","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in building facilities and overcrowding","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High density of construction and absence of greenery","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited organization of residential units","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation and overcrowding in multi-family housing","category":"Inadequate housing design for pandemic conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on flexibility of buildings may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the residential area.","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for distancing and segregation within the residential area may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluating the resilience of existing housing stock and examining the guidelines for its improvement during a pandemic","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey examines advantages and disadvantages of living in apartments and houses during the pandemic, potentially uncovering environmental factors that contribute to disease spread.","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems  ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate lighting and ventilation in residential environments","category":"Inadequate housing design for pandemic conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate residential space for pandemic scenarios","category":"Inadequate housing design for pandemic conditions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-adherence to florence nightingale’s design principles for indoor environments, such as high ceilings, natural lighting, and ventilation.","category":"Inadequate housing design for pandemic conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation provision due to tightly constructed buildings and space restrictions.","category":"Inadequate housing design for pandemic conditions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglecting the physical processes crucial to droplet evolution within an indoor environment.","category":"Inadequate housing design for pandemic conditions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of droplet behavior and propagation in the built environment may lead to incorrect social distancing rules.","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on simplified models and assumptions may result in inaccurate assessment of social distancing requirements.","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for directionality of respiratory events in layout design","category":"Inadequate housing design for pandemic conditions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate social distancing recommendations based on assumptions about droplet behavior","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient emphasis on ventilation and air quality in reducing airborne transmission","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate integration of face masks and coverings with other preventive measures such as social distancing and hand hygiene","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to high airborne infection risk","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate source reduction and management of indoor events","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate purging of rooms between events leading to higher concentration of virus-laden particles","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential for airborne transmission of covid-19 due to inadequate purging and ventilation in enclosed spaces.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"A cloud of infected aerosol may be mixed by the wakes of many people in spaces like supermarkets, increasing the risk of exposure to subsequent individuals.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The settling time of small aerosols being comparable to ventilation timescales, leading to prolonged exposure to aerosols in indoor spaces.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased residence time of small aerosols","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex ventilation flows and air flow between spaces","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Centralized recirculation systems not effective at filtering out viral material","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited supply of clean air in spaces due to filter effectiveness and flow rate","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration in certain areas of the room due to airflow patterns and room size","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of air cleaners/filters","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ceiling fans inhibiting the vertical mixing and dilution of virus-laden particles within the breathing zone","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex sizing and installation of upper room uv systems","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment in university facilities, office buildings, and industrial facilities","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adaptive methods leading to less compact working environments and more individual allocated spaces","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in scaling conventional testing for mass surveillance","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused urban standards","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity and throughput due to current diagnostic methods","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused urban standards","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of manufacturing and supply chains for diagnostic testing.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sampling and sample preparation for sewage analysis","category":"Lack of emphasis on water quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of sewage networks and treatment plants can lead to delayed detection of contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in accurately estimating the population size contributing to a sewage treatment plant can result in inaccurate calculations of the percentage of infected population.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Comparison of infection rates between communities using wbe monitoring data requires careful calibration and standardization procedures.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient monitoring data for contagious diseases","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"}]}
